TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . She is employed as a cleaning lady at ORG of GPE “ NORP ” .
CARDINAL . On DATE she lodged a civil action with ORG asking for a sum of MONEY ( GRD ) ( i.e. MONEY ) in respect of unpaid salaries .
CARDINAL . On DATE her action was accepted . This decision was certified ( θεώρηση ) on DATE ( judgment no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the hospital lodged an appeal .

CARDINAL . By judgment dated DATE ORG quashed judgment no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL of ORG and partially allowed the applicant ’s appeal ( judgment no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged an appeal on points of law .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG partially accepted the appeal and remitted the case to a different division of ORG ( judgment no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) . This judgment was finalised on DATE . It does not transpire from the case file that these proceedings have been concluded .
